DOC.brief_summary: Study Assess Absorption , Metabolism Excretion [ 14C ] AZD8931 Single-Dose Oral Administration
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Volunteers , Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion ( ADME ) Study With Single Oral Administration 14C AZD8931
DOC.criteria: Have body mass index ( BMI ) ≥19 ≤30 kg/m2 weight ≥50 kg ≤100 kg . Regular daily bowel movement ( ie , production least 1 stool per day ) . Nonsmokers exsmokers stop smoke > 3 month Visit 1 use nicotine product > 3 month Healthy Male volunteer age 50 65 year , inclusive Healthy volunteer expose radiation level background ( eg , Xray examination ) > 5 mSv last year , > 10 mSv last 5 year , cumulative total > 1 mSv per year life Participation prior radiolabelled study within 12 month screen visit ( Visit 1 ) . History alcohol abuse excessive intake alcohol define regular weekly intake 28 unit alcohol ( 1 unit=25 mL spirit , 125 mL wine , 250 mL beer lager )
